text: No tax on motor vehicle fuels exported or sold for exportation from the District of Columbia to any other jurisdiction or nation shall be imposed.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2309.

1973 Ed., § 47-1909.

DC CODE § 47-2309

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Fuel exported from District of Columbia exempted from taxation.
